Class AlphaZeroMCTS

java.lang.Object
AI.alphazero.mcts.AlphaZeroMCTS
public class AlphaZeroMCTS extends Object
Implements a Monte Carlo Tree Search (MCTS) specifically designed for AlphaZero.

Unlike standard MCTS, this implementation uses a neural network to guide the search. The network provides:

  • Prior probabilities (Policy): Used to bias selection towards promising moves.
  • Value evaluation: Used to estimate the win probability of leaf nodes without random rollouts.
This class also supports adding Dirichlet noise to the root node during training to encourage exploration.

    • AlphaZeroMCTS

      public AlphaZeroMCTS(Batcher batcher, AlphaZeroConfig cfg)

      Parameters:
      cfg - the configuration containing hyperparameters like CPUCT

  • Method Details

    • search

      public Node search(Board rootBoard, Color rootPlayer, int iterations, boolean training)
      Performs the MCTS search process.

      If training is true, Dirichlet noise is added to the root node's priors to ensure diverse move selection during self-play. * @param rootBoard the current state of the board

      Parameters:
      rootPlayer - the player whose turn it is
      iterations - the number of MCTS simulations to perform
      training - true if training (adds noise), false if playing/evaluating (deterministic)
      Returns:
      the root Node of the search tree after simulations are complete

    • backpropagate

      private void backpropagate(Node node, double value)
      Backpropagates the evaluation value from a leaf node up to the root.
      Parameters:
      node - the leaf node from which to start backpropagation
      value - the evaluation value to propagate (from the perspective of the current player at the leaf)

    • expandAndEvaluate

      private double expandAndEvaluate(Node node, Board board, Color player)
      Expands the given node by querying the neural network for policy and value. Creates child nodes for each legal move with prior probabilities from the policy.
      Parameters:
      node - the node to expand
      board - the current board state at this node
      player - the player to move at this node
      Returns:
      the value evaluation from the neural network

    • selectBestChild

      private Node selectBestChild(Node parent)
      Selects the best child node using the PUCT formula.
      Parameters:
      parent - the parent node from which to select a child
      Returns:
      the selected child node

    • getSearchPolicy

      public double[] getSearchPolicy(Node root, double temperature)
      Generates a probability distribution (policy) over all possible moves based on visit counts.

      The temperature parameter controls the exploration/exploitation balance:

      • High temperature (~1.0): Probability is proportional to visit counts (used in early training).
      • Low temperature (~0.0): Probability concentrates on the most visited move (used in competitive play).
      * @param root the root node of the search tree
      Parameters:
      temperature - the temperature parameter controlling distribution sharpness
      Returns:
      an array of probabilities corresponding to the flattened board indices

    • addDirichletNoiseToRoot

      private void addDirichletNoiseToRoot(Node root)
      Adds Dirichlet noise to the root node's prior probabilities to encourage exploration.
      Parameters:
      root - the root node of the search tree
